alert.note: Alert for Preble (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 2:56AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN WAYNE, UNION, SOUTHEASTERN FAYETTE COUNTIES IN EAST CENTRAL INDIANA AND SOUTHWESTERN PREBLE COUNTIES IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO THROUGH 330 AM EDT... At 255 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Liberty, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 35 mph, pea size hail, frequent cloud-to-ground lightning, and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Lightning can cause serious injury or death. Visibility will be poor and hydroplaning is possible. Locations impacted include... Richmond, Connersville, Liberty, Salem, Waterloo, Abington, Brownsville, Boston, Richmond Municipal Airport, Dunlapsville, Whitewater State Park, Goodwins Corner, West Florence, Mettel Field, Muttonville, Lake Lakengren, New Hope, Springersville, Witts Station and Alquina. This includes the following Interstates... I-70 in Indiana near mile marker 156. I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 0 and 2. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...35 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Motorists should slow down and use extra caution. When thunder roars, go indoors! Do not stay in the open or seek shelter under trees when lightning threatens. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
